articles.title: Tesla Cybertruck explosion outside Trump’s Las Vegas hotel kills 1, injures 7
articles.description: One person died and seven others were injured Wednesday when a Tesla Cybertruck that appeared to be carrying fireworks caught fire and exploded outside President-elect Donald Trump’s Las Vegas hotel, authorities said.
articles.content:
Police block the area after a vehicle caught fire and exploded outside the lobby of President-elect Donald Trump's hotel Wednesday, Jan. 1, 2025. (AP Photo/Ty ONeil)

articles.title: Tesla Cybertruck explodes outside Trump hotel, Elon Musk blames fireworks
articles.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk says a Cybertruck electric pickup explosion outside the Trump International Hotel Las Vegas was caused by fireworks.
articles.content:
A Tesla Cybertruck has exploded outside the Trump International Hotel Las Vegas, killing at least one occupant and injuring several members of the public.

articles.title: Tesla cybertruck explosion outside Trump hotel in Las Vegas could be terror attack
articles.description: The driver, who was inside the truck when it caught fire, died in the incident and seven other people were injured.
articles.content:
A Tesla cybertruck explosion outside one of Donald Trump's US hotels is being investigated as a potential terror attack.

articles.title: Donald, Melania Trump dance to 'YMCA' during New Year's Eve party
articles.description: Watch President-elect Donald Trump and his wife, Melania, sing and dance to "YMCA" during their New Year's Eve party at Mar-a-Lago.
articles.content:
The Trumps gave it their all while ringing in 2025.
Donald and Melania celebrated New Year’s Eve at his Mar-a-Lago Club estate in Palm Beach, Fla., on Tuesday, where they were seen singing and dancing to the Village People’s 1978 hit, “YMCA.”

articles.description: The explosion outside the Trump International Hotel Las Vegas on New Year's Day is being investigated as a possible act of terrorism, sources said.
articles.content:
A Tesla Cybertruck that exploded outside the Trump Towers in Las Vegas killing at least one person is being investigated as a possible act of terrorism, multiple sources with knowledge of the investigation told CBS News.
